attributes.action: allow the Government to continue its work to the end of its full term to allow the electorate to accurately judge the performance of the new leadership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not possible to judge a leader after only 100 or so days in office.  The country needs time to fully determine the strengths and weaknesses of the polices being proposed and the effectiveness of the government in converting policy into action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
